author: seamonkey82
content:
I've noticed that with prysm-besu, nimbus-besu, and lodestar-besu, I regularly see 
```
WARN  | EngineExchangeTransitionConfiguration | not called in 120 seconds, consensus client may not be connected
```
whereas I don't see this with lighthouse-besu or teku-besu.  However, this doesn't appear to have any noticeable impact on validator performance.  Should the threshold for this warning be increased, or should the relevant CL clients be calling `EngineExchangeTransitionConfiguration` more frequently?
